name: cloudtrail-data-tables
query:
SELECT table_catalog, table_schema, table_name, table_type
FROM information_schema.tables
WHERE LOWER(table_name) LIKE '%cloudtrail%' OR LOWER(table_name) LIKE '%cloud_trail%'

meta.sql_description: Find database tables whose names contain {search_term_1} or {search_term_2}
meta.sql_flow_diagram:
flowchart TD
    Q["Question: What tables contain CloudTrail data?"]
    T1[("information_schema.tables")]
    F1{"Filter: table_name LIKE '%cloudtrail%' OR '%cloud_trail%'"}
    F2{"Apply LOWER() for case-insensitive search"}
    S1["Select: table_catalog, table_schema, table_name, table_type"]
    R["Result: List of tables containing CloudTrail data"]
    
    Q --> T1
    T1 --> F2
    F2 --> F1
    F1 --> S1
    S1 --> R
meta.sql_template:
SELECT table_catalog, table_schema, table_name, table_type
FROM information_schema.tables
WHERE LOWER(table_name) LIKE ? OR LOWER(table_name) LIKE ?
